# Ventricle Signs & Symptoms
## Premature Ventricular contraction

- <3 PVCs is considered normal
    - Ask about symptoms (continue if no symptoms)
    - Make sure 
- 3+
    - Stop treating?
    - Alert nurse/Doctor?
- Variables
    - Caffeine
    - Other drugs
